content.rendered:
Directed by Virinchi Varma.

Written by Virinchi Varma.

Cast Nani(Aditya).Riya Suman. Anu Emmanuel(Kiran Mayi). Priya Shri(Sumanjali) . Keshav Deepak(Sumanjali’s Father (credit only)). Vennela Kishore(Bansali).Krishna Murali Posani. S.S. Rajamouli(Self).Sapthagiri. Satya(Kasi).Sivannarayana. Raj Tarun(Hemanth)

Language Telugu.

Producers Geetha Golla. P. Kiran.

Production Anandi Art Creations. Keva Movies.
